mapper.select: SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(connection_date, '%H') AS SIGNED) as hour,COUNT(student_seq) as count_connection FROM csat_connection_student WHERE connection_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{ymd}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND connection_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{ymd}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 day) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(connection_date, '%H')

SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(connection_date, '%d') AS SIGNED) as day,COUNT(student_seq) as count_connection FROM csat_connection_student WHERE connection_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{ym},'01'), '%Y-%m-%d') AND connection_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{ym},'01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 month) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(connection_date, '%d')

SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(connection_date, '%m') AS SIGNED) as month,COUNT(student_seq) as count_connection FROM csat_connection_student WHERE connection_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year},'0101'), '%Y-%m-%d') AND connection_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year},'0101'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 year) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(connection_date, '%m')
